About Me

I've been studying web development and design for the past couple of months. In the process of learning, I have created a couple of small projects to practice what I have learned.


My Goal is to expand my knowledge and mastery of web development and for the long term, branch out to software and mobile development. I look forward to things that I will learn and the people that I'll meet along the way.
